resources.string: ¼ cup of hummus or bean dip \n½ cup cooked beans, split peas, lentils, tofu or tempeh \n1 cup of fresh peas or sprouted lentils
½ cup fresh or frozen \n¼ cup dried
1 medium-sized fruit \n1 cup cut-up fruit \n¼ cup dried fruit

½ cup chopped 
½ cup Brussels sprouts 
½ cup Broccoli sprouts 
1 tablespoon horseradish

1 cup raw leafy vegetables 
½ cup raw or cooked non-leafy vegetables 
½ cup vegetable juice 
¼ cup fried mushrooms
¼ spoon of turmeric \nAny other salt-free herbs and spices you enjoy
¼ cup nuts or seeds \n2 tablespoons nuts or sed butter

½ cup hot cereal or cooked grains, pasta or corn kernels 
1 cup cold cereal 
1 tortilla or slice of bread 
½ a bagel or English muffin 
3 cups popped popcorn
90 minutes of moderate-intensity activities \n40 minutes of vigorous-intensity activity
